item.description: Channeling that famous boxer exuberance into a super-fun ALL Boxer Basic Obedience Class!....... This is a formal, 7 week course beginning Saturday, November 5th at 10:00a at Lucky Dogs Day Care in Milford, MA. (Week one: handlers ONLY. Bring your dog to all consecutive classes)............. Topics to include ALL of your basic obedience cues - loose-leash walking, focus, sit, down, wait, stay, drop it, leave it, come - PLUS specific coursework geared toward this playful, goofy, energetic and fun breed! Ways to channel that exuberance & energy; games; play-training........... Cost is $250, paid up front in advance, and space is limited. Price includes access to private practice workshops............... Open to dogs 16 weeks and up. Whether they have never been in a formal class before or are brushing up on their obedience/distraction work, if you have a boxer or boxer mix, this is the class for you.............. Call April at (508) 634-3037 to sign up. Email justcassie101@gmail.com with any questions............... See my listing here: http://www.thumbtack..... Also available for private in-home training and other group classes. (http://www.facebook.com/cassiestock). Barbara Jean Crehan, our executive director, is also NEBBC endorsed, a 12-year veteran dog trainer, and can be reached at bjcrehan88@hotmail.com for private in-home consultations/training. Find her on facebook here: http://www.facebook.c.... We are also preparing to welcome our very own Lorena Lacasse, vice president of the NEBBC to our training staff! She can be reached at newenglandbullybreedclub@gmail.com............ Hope to see you on November 5th!
item.name: ALL Boxer Basics Obedience Class w/Cassie-Leigh Stock at Lucky Dogs Day Care
